1. Encourage strong coughing if the child can breathe or speak.

   • If over 1 yr, follow with up to 5 abdominal thrusts (Heimlich); if under 1 yr, use 5 chest thrusts instead.  
   • Repeat back blows and thrusts until the object clears or the child goes unresponsive.  
3. If unresponsive: begin CPR (30 compressions, 2 rescue breaths) and continue until help arrives or breathing returns.
